verses.verse: In the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1254>created<s%> the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And the <S%H776>earth<s%> was <S%H8414>without<s%> <S%H8414>form,<s%> and <S%H922>void;<s%> and <S%H2822>darkness<s%> was on the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H8415>deep.<s%> And the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7363>moved<s%> on the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H4325>waters.<s%>
And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Let there be <S%H216>light:<s%> and there was <S%H216>light.<s%>
And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H216>light,<s%> that it was <S%H2896>good:<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H914>divided<s%> the <S%H216>light<s%> from the <S%H2822>darkness.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H216>light<s%> <S%H3117>Day,<s%> and the <S%H2822>darkness<s%> he <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H3915>Night.<s%> And the <S%H6153>evening<s%> and the <S%H1242>morning<s%> were the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Let there be a <S%H7549>firmament<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> and let it <S%H914>divide<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> from the <S%H4325>waters.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H7549>firmament,<s%> and <S%H914>divided<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H7549>firmament<s%> from the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were <S%H5921>above<s%> the <S%H7549>firmament:<s%> and it was <S%H3651>so.<s%>
And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H7549>firmament<s%> <S%H8064>Heaven.<s%> And the <S%H6153>evening<s%> and the <S%H1242>morning<s%> were the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Let the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> be <S%H6960>gathered<s%> together to <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> and let the <S%H3004>dry<s%> land <S%H7200>appear:<s%> and it was <S%H3651>so.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H3004>dry<s%> land <S%H776>Earth;<s%> and the <S%H4723>gathering<s%> together of the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> he <S%H3220>Seas:<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that it was <S%H2896>good.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Let the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1876>bring<s%> <S%H1876>forth<s%> <S%H1877>grass,<s%> the <S%H6212>herb<s%> <S%H2232>yielding<s%> <S%H2233>seed,<s%> and the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%> <S%H6213>yielding<s%> <S%H6529>fruit<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind,<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> is in itself, on the <S%H776>earth:<s%> and it was <S%H3651>so.<s%>

And the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H1877>grass,<s%> and <S%H6212>herb<s%> <S%H2232>yielding<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind,<s%> and the <S%H6086>tree<s%> <S%H6213>yielding<s%> <S%H6529>fruit,<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> was in itself, after his <S%H4327>kind:<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that it was <S%H2896>good.<s%>
And the <S%H6153>evening<s%> and the <S%H1242>morning<s%> were the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Let there be <S%H3974>lights<s%> in the <S%H7549>firmament<s%> of the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> to <S%H914>divide<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> from the <S%H3915>night;<s%> and let them be for <S%H226>signs,<s%> and for <S%H4150>seasons,<s%> and for <S%H3117>days,<s%> and <S%H8141>years:<s%>
And let them be for <S%H3974>lights<s%> in the <S%H7549>firmament<s%> of the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> to give <S%H216>light<s%> on the <S%H776>earth:<s%> and it was <S%H3651>so.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3974>lights;<s%> the <S%H1419>greater<s%> <S%H3974>light<s%> to <S%H4475>rule<s%> the <S%H3117>day,<s%> and the <S%H6996>lesser<s%> <S%H3974>light<s%> to <S%H4475>rule<s%> the <S%H3915>night:<s%> he made the <S%H3556>stars<s%> also.
And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>set<s%> them in the <S%H7549>firmament<s%> of the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> to give <S%H216>light<s%> on the <S%H776>earth,<s%>

And to <S%H4910>rule<s%> over the <S%H3117>day<s%> and over the <S%H3915>night,<s%> and to <S%H914>divide<s%> the <S%H216>light<s%> from the <S%H2822>darkness:<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that it was <S%H2896>good.<s%>
And the <S%H6153>evening<s%> and the <S%H1242>morning<s%> were the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Let the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H8317>bring<s%> <S%H8317>forth<s%> <S%H8317>abundantly<s%> the <S%H8318>moving<s%> <S%H8318>creature<s%> that has <S%H2416>life,<s%> and <S%H5775>fowl<s%> that may <S%H5774>fly<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> in the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H7549>firmament<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1254>created<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8577>whales,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>creature<s%> that <S%H7430>moves,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H8317>brought<s%> <S%H8317>forth<s%> <S%H8317>abundantly,<s%> after their <S%H4327>kind,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3671>winged<s%> <S%H5775>fowl<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind:<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that it was <S%H2896>good.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> them, <S%H559>saying,<s%> Be <S%H6509>fruitful,<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply,<s%> and <S%H4390>fill<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> in the <S%H3220>seas,<s%> and let <S%H5775>fowl<s%> <S%H7235>multiply<s%> in the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
And the <S%H6153>evening<s%> and the <S%H1242>morning<s%> were the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Let the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H3318>bring<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>creature<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind,<s%> <S%H929>cattle,<s%> and <S%H7431>creeping<s%> thing, and <S%H2416>beast<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind:<s%> and it was <S%H3651>so.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H2416>beast<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind,<s%> and <S%H929>cattle<s%> after their <S%H4327>kind,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> thing that <S%H7431>creeps<s%> on the <S%H127>earth<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind:<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that it was <S%H2896>good.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Let us <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> in our <S%H6754>image,<s%> after our <S%H1823>likeness:<s%> and let them have <S%H7287>dominion<s%> over the <S%H1710>fish<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and over the <S%H5775>fowl<s%> of the <S%H8064>air,<s%> and over the <S%H929>cattle,<s%> and over <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and over <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7431>creeping<s%> thing that <S%H7430>creeps<s%> on the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

So <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1254>created<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> in his own <S%H6754>image,<s%> in the <S%H6754>image<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1254>created<s%> he him; <S%H2145>male<s%> and <S%H5347>female<s%> <S%H1254>created<s%> he them.

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> them, and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, Be <S%H6509>fruitful,<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply,<s%> and <S%H4390>replenish<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H3533>subdue<s%> it: and have <S%H7287>dominion<s%> over the <S%H1710>fish<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and over the <S%H5775>fowl<s%> of the <S%H8064>air,<s%> and over <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2416>living<s%> thing that <S%H7430>moves<s%> on the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> you <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6212>herb<s%> <S%H2232>bearing<s%> <S%H2233>seed,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is on the <S%H6440>face<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6086>tree,<s%> in the <S%H834>which<s%> is the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of a <S%H6086>tree<s%> <S%H2232>yielding<s%> <S%H2233>seed;<s%> to you it shall be for <S%H402>meat.<s%>

And to <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2416>beast<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and to <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5775>fowl<s%> of the <S%H8064>air,<s%> and to <S%H3605>every<s%> thing that <S%H7430>creeps<s%> on the <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> there is <S%H2416>life,<s%> I have given <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3418>green<s%> <S%H6212>herb<s%> for <S%H402>meat:<s%> and it was <S%H3651>so.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> thing that he had <S%H6213>made,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> it was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2896>good.<s%> And the <S%H6153>evening<s%> and the <S%H1242>morning<s%> were the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>
